item.title: Volkswagen Constellation 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 14, 2025

Volkswagen Constellation 1.53 ETS2

The Volkswagen Constellation mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a realistic and detailed Brazilian truck to the game. Featuring high-quality textures, a fully detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics, this mod enhances the trucking experience. It includes various customization options, multiple chassis configurations, and advanced lighting effects, allowing for full personalization. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for Volkswagen truck enthusiasts looking for an immersive and authentic driving experience.

Credits: paulo junior

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania 113h primeio 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 14, 2025

Scania 113h primeio 1.53 ETS2

The Scania 113H Primeiro mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a classic and detailed Scania truck to the game. Featuring high-quality exterior and interior details, realistic engine sounds, accurate driving physics, and functional dashboard animations, this mod enhances the trucking experience. It includes various customization options, multiple chassis configurations, and advanced lighting effects, allowing for full personalization. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for Scania enthusiasts who enjoy vintage trucks with a realistic feel.

Credits: paulo junior

item.title: Sparta 4 Bolster Log Trailer v1.2 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 14, 2025

Sparta 4 Bolster Log Trailer v1.2 ATS

Update 1.2
– New cargo system support for 1.54

Description:
This is a fairly standard 4-bolster log trailer made by Sparta Manufacturing out of Tallulah, Louisiana.

Wheels:
This mod is compatible with my wheel pack. Make sure you have the Wheel Pack set with higher priority than the trailer(s) in the Mod Manager. This trailer uses the 11R24.5 Goodyear G314’s on steel rims.

Credits: Smarty

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Rodotrem 25m cacamba 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 14, 2025

Rodotrem 25m cacamba 1.53 ETS2

The Rodotrem 25m Caçamba mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a high-quality and realistic 25-meter tipper trailer to the game. Featuring detailed textures, accurate physics, and functional tipping animations, this mod enhances the heavy cargo transport experience. It includes various customization options, multiple configurations, and advanced lighting effects, making it ideal for long-haul and bulk material transportation. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players looking for an immersive and authentic rodotrem trucking experience.

Credits: paulo junior

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Pack Facchini Basculante 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 14, 2025

Pack Facchini Basculante 1.53 ETS2

The Pack Facchini Basculante mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a high-quality and realistic Brazilian tipper trailer pack to the game. Featuring detailed textures, accurate physics, and multiple customization options, this mod enhances the cargo transport experience. It includes various trailer configurations, custom paint jobs, and functional tipping animations, providing an immersive and authentic trucking experience. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players who want to expand their trailer selection with durable and realistic tipper trailers.

Credits: paulo junior
